about_the_game:
This Rock ‘n’ Roll Pack includes 29 Rock-inspired Clothing Items, 4 Rock-inspired Wigs, 1 Punk Rat Pet, 1 Punk Horse Mount, and 12 different Furniture Items.

Break out those guitars and get your fists pumping! This Rock ‘n’ Roll Pack will give you all the gear you need to look the part as you shred through Sun Haven with musical power.

Pack includes:

  • Rock Furniture Set including: Tables, Rugs, a Bed, a Wardrobe, a Couch, Guitar Wall Decorations, and Lamps
  • Rock ‘n’ Roll Horse Mount
  • Slash, the Punk Rat Pet
  • 5 Rock Outfit Sets including: 14 Hats, 9 Shirts, 1 Dress, and 9 Pants
